name: The Tomb of Darius Vöd
description:
The Tomb of Darius Vöd

A puzzle game by WiL

Made in 2023

Story

You are Darius Vöd (rhymes with rude), an ambitious and hardworking servant of It, a giant green slime that dominated the people of Earth for countless eons.

After a rebellion, It abandoned Earth, leaving Darius and others with an odd superstructure to explore. Now caught in the hyperbubble of its departure, Darius must brave obscure horrors and find a way through the strange wastes.

Controls
  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • SPACE: Continue (in cutscenes)
  • Shift+Arrow Keys: Throw/Shoot
  • Z or K: Knapsack (if available)
  • Z or K: Menu (Where applicable)
